name: Rainbow
description: Rainbow is a 50/50 indica/sativa hybrid from Spanish breeders Lifetime Seeds, created by crossing Dancehall with Blueberry.  A compact, fast flowering strain with little side-branching, it does very well when grown in the “sea-of-green” style. Rainbow presents a wide array of colors towards the end of flowering, hence the moniker. With a spicy-sweet fruity flavor, this tasty hybrid can give consumers a pleasant, creative high and pain relief without a heavy body sensation.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Energetic, Stress, Pain, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
